name.en: Chair of Colloidal and Environmental Chemistry

structural_unit_name.en: Chair of Colloidal and Environmental Chemistry

description.en: Water and wastewater treatment technologies have an important role in the environmental technology area dealing at the moment with new approaches in this field. The course gives comprehensive overview about the legal framework, international environmental oblications and technological aspects of drinking water and wastewater management. Production of potable water from ground water as well as from surface water will be introduced. Special focus is also given to the modern technologies of municipal and industrial wastewater treatment.
description.et: Kursuses käsitletakse vee ressursside tehnoloogilise kasutamise eesmärke, vee kasutamisega seonduvat seadusandlust ning rahvusvahelisi kokkuleppeid ja kohustusi. Tutvustatakse vee kvaliteedist tingitud enamlevinud tehnoloogiaid tarbeveevee tootmisel põhjaveest ja pinnaveest. Eraldi osana tutvustatakse olme- ja tööstusreovee puhastuses kasutatavaid tehnoloogiaid.

objectives.en: To introduce main processes in water technology for drinking water and other types of consumable waters. To present requirements for water quality assurance and an overview of international cooperation in the field of assurance of water resources. Formation and quality of different wastewaters. To introduce main technologies for wastewater treatment.
objectives.et: Tuvuda joogivee ning teiste tarbevee liikide tootmisel kasutatavate veeallikate, kehtestatud nõuete ning meetoditega. Anda ülevaade reovee tekkest, liikidest ning reoveepuhastusprotsesside tehnoloogiatest.

learning_outcomes.en: 1) is familiar with parameters which are used in characterisation of water resources
learning_outcomes.et: 1) tunneb veeallikate iseloomustamiseks kasutatavaid parameetreid ning nende määramise meetodeid;

learning_outcomes.en: 2) knows requirements for basic types of consumable waters

3) is acquainted with legislation in the field of drinking water, wastewater and other types of consumable waters. Knows main principles of international cooperation in the field of water resources and management
learning_outcomes.et: 3) on teadlik vee-alasest seadusandlusest tulenevate nõuetest tarbeveele, reoveele, heitveele ning tunneb olulisemaid rahvusvahelisi kokkuleppeid veemajanduse valdkonnas;

learning_outcomes.en: 4) knows main technologies in drinking water technology
learning_outcomes.et: 4) tunneb joogivee tootmisel kasutatavaid olulisemaid tehnoloogilisi protsesse;

learning_outcomes.en: 5) is able to characterize wastewater quality and knows requirements for treated wastewater before sending it to the natural waterbody
learning_outcomes.et: 5) oskab iseloomustada reovee kvaliteeti ja heitveele kehtestatavate parameetrite saavutamiseks kasutatavaid tehnolooglisi protsesse;

learning_outcomes.en: 6) is able to perform simple calculations which are in use in water and wastewater technologies
learning_outcomes.et: 6) oskab teostada joogivee ning reovee tehnoloogias rakendatavaid lihtsamaid arvutusi;

learning_outcomes.en: 7) knows how is working an water enterprise, can analyse the technology used in the enterprise and is able to give reasons for applying technological solutions in the water enterprise
learning_outcomes.et: 7) on tutvunud vee-ettevõtte tööga, koostanud vee-ettevõtte tööd analüüsiva ülevaate ning oskab põhjendada ettevõttes vajalike tehnoloogiliste lahenduste rakendamist.

notes.et: Seoses koroonaviirusega seotud piirangutega toimub aine veebipõhiselt ja keskkonnas Panopto.
